verses.roman:
tṛtīya kāraṇa śuna śrī-bhagavān
ananta brahmāṇḍa bahu vaikuṇṭhādi dhāma

synonyms: tṛtīya—third; kāraṇa—reason; śuna—please hear; śrī-bhagavān—O Supreme Personality of Godhead; ananta—unlimited; brahma-aṇḍa—universes; bahu—many; vaikuṇṭha-ādi—Vaikuṇṭha, etc.; dhāma—planets.
translation: "O my Lord, O Supreme Personality of Godhead! Kindly hear my third reason. There are countless universes and fathomless transcendental Vaikuṇṭhas.
